```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(primer.data)
library(tidyverse)
```

Using NHANES data to make some pretty plots of height. This pairs with next weeks course when we look at the height of NBA players.


```{r}
nhanes |> 
  filter(age >= 18) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = height)) +
    geom_histogram() +
    facet_wrap(facets = gender)
```
